# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-102">組織電子郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-103">在網頁型 Outlook，您可以使用命令類似 **(Sweep flag)** ，並**將移至**要自動刪除或移動郵件來自特定寄件者。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-104">當您選取收件匣中的郵件時，這些命令會出現 [訊息] 清單上方。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-105">**(Sweep flag)**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-106">可讓您快速地刪除郵件收件匣中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-107">您可以自動刪除該寄件者的所有內送電子郵件、 保持最新電子郵件和刪除其餘部分，或刪除超過 10 天的電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-108">**移至**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-109">可讓您將特定郵件的郵件移到另一個資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ac2a5-110">若要深入了解，請參閱[Working with outlook 網頁版中的郵件資料夾](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ac2a5-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
